sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Oke osisi dara n’ụwa n’ụbọchị Tọọzde dịka ọkaibe n’egwu bọọlụ nke mba Brazil bụ Pele lara mmụọ.
Ọtụtụ ndị welitere isi n’ụwa amalite izipụta ozi nkwanye ugwu nye nakwa ndụ o biri.
Nyemar nke mba Brazil kwuru na ‘Eze’ Pele ‘Gbanwere ihe niile’ oge o kwuru okwu banyere ndụ ya nakwa etu o siri metụta egwu bọọlụ.
Etu Buhari, Neymar, Mbappe, Ronaldo na ndị ọzọ si akwanyere Pele ugwu
O kwuru  “Ọ gbanwere ya egwu bọọlụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri, ihe egwuregwu obi ụtọ. O ji egwu bọọlụ nyere ndị na-eweghị ka ọhara ha aka nakwa ndị isi ojii”
Ọgba bọọlụ Kylian Mbappe nke mba France dere n’akara soshal midia ya na Pele bụ ‘Eze egwu bọọlụ’, “Agaghị echefu ụkpụrụ ya”.
Pele onye mere ihe e metubeghị mgbe dịka ọgbanyere nchịkọta goolu 1281 n’egwu bọọlụ 1362 o sonyere n’afọ 21 ọ gbara bọọlụ.
Ọ gbanyere mba ya goolu 77 n’ime egwu bọọlụ 92 o sonyere gbaa.
Pele bụ naanị onye bọọlụ ritere ma bulie iko mba ụwa ugboro atọ nke mere n’afọ 1958, 1962 na 1970.
N’afọ 200, otu nhazi egwu bọọlụ ụị̀a bụ Fifa họpụtara ya dịka onye kacha n’egwu bọọlụ na nchịkọta afọ 100.
Ọgbaa bọọlụ ama ama bụ Pele anwụọla29 Disemba 2022
World Cup Final 2022: Gịnị ka uwe ojii Emir Qatar yinyere Messi pụtara?19 Disemba 2022
Argentina ebuliela iko mbaụwa 202218 Disemba 2022
Cristiano Ronaldo nke mba Portugal dere:
“I si Eze Pele ‘Ka ọ dị zie’ nkiti agaghị ezu oke na ngosi ihe mgbu ji ndị egwu bọọlụ n’ụwa aka ugbua”
O kwuru “Agaghị echefu ihe o mere na ndụ anyị niile egwu bọọlụ na-amasị”.
Ronaldo nke mba Brazil kwupụtara na Pele bụ ‘Ọ pụrụiche, ọkaibe, onye isi na-acha ọkụ nakwa onye na-enweghị ntụpọ.”

Mana ọ bụghị naanị ndị egwu bọọlụ bụ ndị na-akwanyere ya ugwu a, Onyeisiala Muhammdu Buhari ezipụla ozi maka ọnwụ ya ma kwuo na ụwa agaghị echefu ya ọkachasị etu o siri rụọ ọrụ ikpe udo na ịjịkọ agbụrụ na okpekerechi dị iche iche n’ụwa.
Akara Twitter gọọmentị mba Brazil dere “Dike anyị” ga-abụ onye “anyị agaghị echefu echefu n’ụwa a”.
Onyeisiala Joe Biden nke mba Amerịka kwuru “N’egwu bọọlụ a na-akpọkọta ụwa niile ọnụ, etu Pele siri rie elu agbanyeghị n’ọnọdụ dị ala ebe o siri pụta bụ ihe gosiri na enweghị a na-apụghị ime.”
Onyeisi otu nhazi bọọlụ Fifa bụ Gianni Infantino kwuru na obi gbawara ya dịka ọ kọwara na “ihe bụ ụbọchị dị oke egwu nye egwu bọọlụ n’ụwa”.
Ọkaibe n’egwu ịgba ọsọ bụ Usain Bolt depụtara na Pele bụ “onye egwuregwu nọ agaghị echefu echefu”.
Nwa ya nwaanyị bụ Kely Nascimento zipụtara foto gosiri ihe dịka aka Pele mgbe ọ nọ n’ụlọọgwụ ma kwuo:
“Anyị na-eleke gị n’ihi ihe ọbụla anyị bụ taa bụ maka gị, anyị hụrụ gị n’anya, laa na ndokwa”.
N'akụkụ ụwa dị iche iche amalitela itinye ihe nka, foto nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ na-egosi nkwanye ugwu pụrụiche nye Pele.
Mba Brazil ewepụtala abalị atọ iji ruo uju ma kwanyere ya ugwu dịịrị ya dịka ọ kwalitere aha mba ahụ ụzọ ọma nakwa egwu bọọlụ ha n'ụzọ pụrụiche.
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Ndị mmadụ na-esete foto gosiri ihu Pele n'otu ụlọ na Sao Paulo, Brazil

Mba Brazil ji ọkụ na-acha ka ọla edo gosi nkwanye ugwu nye Pele n'ama egwu egwu Maracana
